ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®), undrained
1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®), crushed
1 ½ teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste
1 ½ teaspoons seasoned salt, or to taste
½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Don't overmix the meatloaf; handle it minimally to keep it tender and moist
Use the canned tomatoes with juice to keep meatloaf moist during baking
Crushed crackers help bind the mixture while adding seasoning and tenderness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This uses ingredients found in many pantries. How does the combination of canned tomatoes and crackers create an easy but flavorful meatloaf?
